title: Sample
medium: Technique: discharge printed by roller on plain weave; shaded roller with troughs arranged diagonally
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Diagonal lines of red shading to lavender with a grid made of yellow dashes and squares. Raying yellow shapes in each corner of the grid and a small yellow flower in the center of each square.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample.
Technique: discharge printed by roller on plain weave; shaded roller with troughs arranged diagonally. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1987-46-62.
